sentences: The group was composed of nine members: Jun, Euijin, Ko Ho-jung, Feeldog, Marco, Ji Han-sol, Daewon, Kijung, and Chan.
Euijin joined A.cian in 2014 under the name Lo-J but left the group in 2015 due to problems with the company, later debuting again in 2016 as a member of Bigflo.
Ko Hojung debuted as a member of Hotshot in 2014.
In 2017, Chan debuted as a member of A.C.E, Kijung as a member of IM, and Marco as a member of Hot Blood Youth.
Ji Hansol is a former SM Rookies trainee who left the company in 2017 to sign with J-FLO Entertainment and debuted with Newkidd.
